ygData.subject: Re: [EQ] Mysteries of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought wizard teleports where the little pyramid things?  Like the one near the ghoul camp in West Karana? From: PHAEDRA WHITLOCK
ygData.messageBody:
I thought wizard teleports where the little pyramid things? Like the
one near the ghoul camp in West Karana?



From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
Reply-To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] [EQ] Mysteries of Norrath
Date: Wed, 29 Dec 1999 14:54:15 -0600

Those are wizard teleports. :)

When we do an Evac, or a teleport to zone, we arrive in the center of them.
The druid Gates look kinda like bargain rate Stonehenge.

Shannyn



>>> "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...> 12/29/99 02:55PM >>>
From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>

Yea, I've noticed that. Again, probably just re-using objects. :)
What are those 4 curved pillar things for? One in greater faydark
near lesser, one in front of the south karana bridge. Those are the
two I've noticed... May be others. Are those for anything?

Ergo Soulhealer
test server


From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
Reply-To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] [EQ] Mysteries of Norrath
Date: Wed, 29 Dec 1999 14:32:54 -0600

Youre probably right about the reusing textures, I dont recall the thread
well, but it started out based on Brad says... when Brad said there were
many undiscovered quests still in the game, so the thread was trying to find
some, or at least stir up ideas. There were supposed to be certain symbols
in various places that were alike, or something...

Ive noticed in Rathe Mountains is a golden pillar on a half platform with a
scarab-like design, that is identical to one in NRo, if it has any
significance or is just coincidence. But the thread went over things like
that.

Shannyn




>>> "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...> 12/29/99 02:21PM >>>
From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>

Brad verified that the Fiery Avenger quest did not exist. I'm not
sure about wall pictures. What do you mean by that? I suspect the
artists just got lazy and re-used images. there is a sea monster in
Lake Rathe that's supposed to be rare, and around level 50. Not sure
what it drops, or even if anyone has ever killed it. Don't know
anything about a clockwork dragon. On the EQ map there is an area
called Dragonscale hills just south of Ak'Anon that was probably
never developed. Perhaps there was supposed to be a clockwork dragon
in this zone?


From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
Reply-To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
To: <sisterhood@...>,<EQ-Quest@onelist.com>,
<Tunare@onelist.com>
Subject: [EQ-Quest] [EQ] Mysteries of Norrath
Date: Wed, 29 Dec 1999 13:54:51 -0600


Once someone sent me a URL for an EQ bulletin board/discussion forum that
contained a thread on Mysteries of Norrath. Focusing on the wall pictures
that are the same in various places.

I lost the url, does anyone have it or recall where this thread was? I found
another thread called Myths and Mysteries of Norrath that included the Fiery
Avenger, Sea Serpent, clockwork dragon in its initial post... this was
interesting too, but not the one I recall reading.

Please help?


Shannyn
